episodes.synopsis: Head to the Farm Community in Tennessee, where pioneer midwife Ina May Gaskin talks candidly about the latest birth trends and the art of midwifery.
episodes.title: Down on the Farm: Conversations with Legendary Midwife Ina May Gaskin

episodes.synopsis: Celebrity moms Laila Ali, Gisele Bundchen, Cindy Crawford, Alyson Hannigan, Melissa Joan Hart and others share their intimate birth stories.
episodes.title: Special Deliveries: Celebrity Mothers Talk Straight on Birth

episodes.synopsis: Explore birth-planning topics such as doulas, birth centers and the alarming increase of cesarean sections performed in the United States and Brazil.
episodes.title: Explore Your Options: Doulas, Birth Centers and C-Sections

episodes.synopsis: VBAC (Vaginal Birth After Cesarean) has become a hot issue in modern maternity care, as one in three new mothers give birth via cesarean section.
episodes.title: The VBAC Dilemma: What Your Options Really Are

video.title: More Business of Being Born
video.synopsis: This follow-up to The Business of Being Born continues the provocative and entertaining exploration of the modern maternity care system.
